"I am Ragnus the Red, and your answer is unfortunate, for I am a 
Decepticon.  But your luck holds today, for I am still slightly 
weakened, and do not wish a battle.  Leave now and you may do so with 
your life."  Ragnus said, very seriously.


> Shivah:
> 
> "You're looking me as if I were your enemy and by now I don't" said 
> Shivah while he trasnformed to his robot mode. "I'm Shivah... I'm a 
> predacon and I owe my loyalty to BlackFortress's Master: Darkfate"
